main.name: Dishebh Bhayana
main.description: I'm an optimistic person but I'm also realistic about how satisfactory or unsatisfactory the current situation is.
main.bio: I am a technical enthusiast, a gamer, a writer, a freelancer and many more. I dived into the technical world hoping to learn about the advancing technology, and followed my passion in a bid to learn and discover myself. Want to know more about me? Why don't you go ahead and see for yourself...

testimonials.text: Without ambition one starts nothing. Without work one finishes nothing. The prize will not be sent to you. You have to win it.
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
